issues_list.title: Submit code for AI review
issues_list.description: Complete flow: paste code → AI analyzes → suggestions appear in seconds

test_strategy.automated_tests: E2E test: paste code, submit, verify suggestions returned
test_strategy.manual_verification: Paste buggy code, verify AI finds real issues within 10 seconds

issues_list.title: View and explore suggestions
issues_list.description: Browse, filter, and understand issues with line highlighting

test_strategy.automated_tests: Component tests for filtering, expansion, and highlighting
test_strategy.manual_verification: Submit code, click through categories, verify line highlighting works

issues_list.title: Apply suggested fix with diff preview
issues_list.description: One-click apply with before/after diff preview and undo

test_strategy.automated_tests: Test diff rendering, apply action, and undo functionality
test_strategy.manual_verification: Apply a fix, verify code changes, test undo within 30 seconds

issues_list.title: Dismiss suggestions
issues_list.description: Hide irrelevant suggestions with optional feedback

test_strategy.automated_tests: Test dismiss action, feedback submission, list update
test_strategy.manual_verification: Dismiss a suggestion, verify it's removed from list

issues_list.title: Configure review preferences
issues_list.description: Toggle which categories AI checks for

test_strategy.automated_tests: Test preference save/load, verify filtering works
test_strategy.manual_verification: Disable Style, run review, verify no style suggestions appear

issues_list.title: View review history
issues_list.description: See past reviews and re-open them

test_strategy.automated_tests: Test history listing, pagination, re-open functionality
test_strategy.manual_verification: Run reviews, check history, open old review

definition_of_done: Each feature independently testable by a human, all acceptance criteria met
